data.name: Dungeon Fighter Online: Hatsune Miku Crossover Package
data.detailed_description:
For limited time only! A Steam exclusive DLC for all Miku lovers!
Get Hatsune Miku Collaboration Avatars and complete special missions to get full benefit of Mikuful goodies!

Package Contents
1) Hatsune Miku Avatar Box (Untradable)
  • Bind to Account
  • Contains untradable Hatsune Miku Avatars of your class choice.

2) Clone Avatar Box
  • Bind to Account
  • Contains 8 pieces of untradable Clone Avatars.

3) Miku's DIVAisu
  • Bind to Account
  • A Mikuful device that displays Steam exclusive missions.
  • Complete missions to get more Mikuful cosmetic items and more!
  • For further detailed information about missions, please refer to in-game mission board.

Hatsune Miku Collaboration Avatars are only available for female characters.
Container boxes expires on OCT 10 so please make sure to use it before it expires!

* Please Note :
Hatsune Miku Crossover Package is only available before SEP 4, 2018.
Steam DLC Redeem UI screen is located under main menu. You must manually redeem purchased DLC in game.
for futher details on redeeming DLC item, please refer Mikulized! page under to link below:
https://www.dfoneople.com/news/events/MIKUMIKU-Event?page=1

data.short_description: For limited time only! A Steam exclusive DLC for all Miku lovers! Get Hatsune Miku Collaboration Avatars and complete special missions to get full benefit of Mikuful goodies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 32bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD space: 18GB HDD space before installation, 10GB HDD space after installation / Browser: Microsoft Internet Explorer 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 64bit and higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E7500 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: VRAM 512MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 18 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD space: 18GB HDD space before installation, 10GB HDD space after installation / Browser: Microsoft Internet Explorer 10 or higher
